layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (0,0) size 800x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 800x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 31x18
          text run at (0,0) width 31: "Bug "

          LayoutText {#text} at (30,0) size 41x18
            text run at (30,0) width 41: "29495"
        LayoutText {#text} at (70,0) size 328x18
          text run at (70,0) width 328: ". You should see one green box below, with no red."
